title: 10/30/2020 HOUR 3 - Dave Roberts
itunes:title: 10/30/2020 HOUR 3 - Dave Roberts
description:
in Hour 3 of the Dan Patrick Show, Chris Fowlers joins to talk about the Covid-19 outbreak among the BIG 10 conference. and how they may affect teams moving forward and being eligible for the Final Four Playoff. Dave Roberts then joins to talk about the Dodgers finally winning a World Series, and what that means for Clayton Kershaw. Also the Justin Turner Covid-19 test results and how the Dodgers managed that situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
